name: Resilience Under Pressure
description: Training in maintaining mental resilience in high-stress situations.

cards.title: Controlled Exposure to Stressors
cards.description: Practicing adaptive responses to controlled psychological stress.
cards.bulletpoints: Incremental exposure, breathing regulation, controlled emotional response training

cards.title: Mental Fortitude Development
cards.description: Building long-term mental endurance through discipline and adaptive mindset techniques.
cards.bulletpoints: Mindfulness resilience, long-term stress conditioning, high-pressure decision-making drills
